thread.title: Norval

author: Norval
title: Norval
text: I've ordered hundreds of seedlings and whips from other nurseries and orchards over the last few years. I decided to order a couple of the older "bearing size" trees so they would be producing now instead of 3-5 years down the road. I was amazed when I opened the box and saw the size of the 2 Fuyu persimmon trees I received recently. I'm ordering more trees from Willis Orchard in time for planting this month.
